sourcesContent: import*as e from"react";import{DropZoneContext as r}from"./DropZoneProvider.mjs";const n=({children:n})=>{const t=e.useContext(r);if(!t)throw new Error("`DropZone.Accept` must be used inside a DropZone");return"accept"===t?e.createElement(e.Fragment,null,n):null},t=({children:n})=>{const t=e.useContext(r);if(!t)throw new Error("`DropZone.Rejected` must be used inside a DropZone");return"reject"===t?e.createElement(e.Fragment,null,n):null},o=({children:n})=>{const t=e.useContext(r);if(!t)throw new Error("`DropZone.Default` must be used inside a DropZone");return"inactive"===t?e.createElement(e.Fragment,null,n):null};export{n as Accepted,o as Default,t as Rejected};
